import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; import { UserAuthenticationService } from '../services/user-authentication.service'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent implements OnInit{ @Input() view: 'grid' | 'list' | 'currcartitem' | 'prevcartitem' = 'list'; constructor(public userAuthentication: UserAuthenticationService, public cartService: CartService) { } @Input() product:Product={ productId: 0, title: '', description: '', price: 0, quantity: 0, productCategory: { categoryId: 1, category: '', subCategory: '' }, offer: { offerId: 1, title: '', discount: 0 }, imageName: '', } ngOnInit(): void { } }
